The user's goal is to remove the 'Images' filter and apply the 'Audio' filter in the 'Downloads' directory.

The user has opened the Files app and clicked on the 'Images' filter. After that, they navigated back.

The user has removed the sort by options, but they have not yet applied the 'Audio' filter.

Therefore, the user has not yet completed the task.
